channel.title: Bjork on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Bjork on mattischrome

item.title: Album Digest, November 2012
item.description: Pretty much a sliding scale between songs and electronic wibble on this month’s albums and a particularly damp, chilly feeling to proceedings too.

item.title: Understated Classics #15: Début by Björk
item.description: I got into Début via a cassette from the library, much like I did with Together Alone by Crowded House. I suppose it is less obscure than many of my choices for this strand but I do think that Post is more well-known (because of It’s Oh So Quiet, which we shall mention here only briefly) and that Homogenic is probably more popular among her fans.

item.title: Album Digest, October 2011
item.description: This month we have albums by Björk, Coldplay, M83, and Radiohead.
